name: Get A Job: Video Resume – Outtakes
detailed_description: Wilhiemer’s database has been hacked and a series of video resumes outtakes/goof-ups have been released. Check out these never before seen videos of various cast members acting out really bad video resume recordings.
about_the_game: Wilhiemer’s database has been hacked and a series of video resumes outtakes/goof-ups have been released. Check out these never before seen videos of various cast members acting out really bad video resume recordings.
